user_query: I'm organizing a charity event and I need some jokes to entertain the attendees. Fetch me a random joke from API Ninjas, a Chuck Norris joke, and a quote to inspire everyone to contribute.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random joke from API Ninjas to entertain the attendees.
Retrieve a Chuck Norris joke for additional entertainment.
Get an inspirational quote to encourage contributions from attendees.
